summary: A gifted female warrior is destined to marry the emperor and bring prosperity to the dynasty.
cast: Sammi Cheng|Anita Mui|Raymond Ho-Yin Wong|Cecilia Cheung|Suet Lam|Tin Sang Lung|Wai Leung Hung|Ka-Sang Cheng|Shiu Hung Hui|Wai Ai|Wong Chun|Joe Cheng|Chi-Ping Chang|Tian-Lin Wang|Man-Wai Wong|Leung Siu|Wai-Man Cheuk|Tiffany Lee
director: Directors: Johnnie To, Ka-Fai Wai (as Wai Ka Fai)
title: Chung Mou Yim
